meanings.definition: Of or relating to a megalopolis.
meanings.sent1: The megalopolitan skyline was filled with towering buildings.
meanings.sent2: She loved the megalopolitan vibe of the bustling city.
meanings.sent3: The megalopolitan traffic made him wish for a teleportation device.
meanings.sent4: Her megalopolitan dreams were as vast as the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The megalopolitan lifestyle was both exciting and overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The megalopolitan enjoyed the convenience of city living.
meanings.sent2: Many megalopolitans commute to work using public transportation.
meanings.sent3: The megalopolitan's pet raccoon caused chaos in the apartment building.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a tiny ant among the megalopolitans rushing around.
meanings.sent5: The megalopolitan knew all the best spots to eat in the city.
